channel.title: INartsAndEnt

item.title: Kevin Costner And Horizon 2 Sued By Stunt Performer Due To Unscripted Sexual Assault Scene
item.description: Kevin Costner and the Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 2 production companies are being sued by a stunt performer for an unscripted assault scene.

item.title: 10 Elden Ring Characters I Hope They Feature In The Movie
item.description: Elden Ring is full of amazing and unique characters that absolutely deserve to be featured in the upcoming movie from A24 and Alex Garland.

item.title: Karate Kid: Legends First Reactions Are In & They All Agree On The Best Part Of The Movie
item.description: The first reactions are in for the new movie Karate Kid: Legends, and while the first audiences have mixed reactions, they agree on one big element.
